Description: AXL BLOODSPORT FIRE AXE ELECTRIC GUITARS CUSTOM GRAPHICS Really Good Condition! Everything works and sounds great. Has lots of scrapes, scratches, nicks, marks and a piece of the white trim on the top of the head is missing. Also dents on the back of the neck and the corner edges of the guitar have chips. Frets 2 and 6 have marks on them. Truss rod cover is bowed a little and a very small hair line crack where neck connects to body. (see pictures) Neck is straight and frets are very clean. Hardware is all clean in great condition. Serial # 0060552897 Comes with the whammy bar ((( The guitar my need adjusting depending on your style of playing ))) OVERVIEW:Mayhem at its finest.When you unleash your hot licks, the AXL Bloodsport FireAx Electric Guitar will sound as threatening as it looks. This guitar features an angular body, and a floating tremolo bridge that's excellent for wailing solos. Two Humbuckers and a single-coil pickup offer the ultimate in tonal variety. No Case FEATURESBody: AlderNeck: Maple with stripeFretboard: RosewoodFinish: Red glossInlay: ArrowheadBridge: Floating tremolo ( licensed under Flyod Rose )Pickups: EMG-designed Alnico pickups - 1 single-coil and 2 double-coil Humbuckers, Controls: 1 volume, 2 tone, 5-way switchNeck profile: Ultra thinNeck joint: Deep cut bolt-onNeck joint location: 21st fret treble, 17th fret bassRadius: 14"Nut width: 1-5/8"Nut type: Locking nutScale length: 25-1/2"Total length: 41-1/2"
